summary: Tested Series API (CRUD operations), WebSocket collaboration endpoint, and UI features. Backend: All 12 tests passed - Series create/read/update/delete, add/remove lessons, stats, and collaboration users endpoint. Frontend: Series page displays correctly with stats (0/0/0 for new user), Create Series modal works with lesson selection, Lesson page shows all TOOLS (Biblical Map, Quiz Generator, Supply List), CROSS REFERENCES, MEMORY VERSE, and MATERIALS sections.

integration_issues.issue: Login form stays on /login page after clicking Sign In - may be expected behavior requiring additional navigation

seed_data_creation: Test series created during pytest (cleaned up after tests)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Series API fully functional with MongoDB persistence. WebSocket collaboration endpoint at /api/ws/lesson/{lessonId} requires token query param. Frontend Series page uses seriesStore with real API calls. PresenceIndicator component connects via WebSocket and shows 'Live' indicator when connected. TOOLS section buttons in lesson detail page are clickable.

series_api_create.notes: POST /api/series creates new series with auto-assigned color and timestamps

series_api_get_all.notes: GET /api/series returns user's series (empty array for unauthenticated)

series_page_ui.notes: Displays stats (Total Series, Lessons Organized, Unique Themes), search/filter bar, and Create Series button

websocket_live_indicator.notes: PresenceIndicator shows green 'Live' dot when WebSocket connected

lesson_tools_biblical_map.notes: Biblical Map button present and clickable in TOOLS section

lesson_tools_quiz_generator.notes: Quiz Generator button present and clickable in TOOLS section

lesson_tools_supply_list.notes: Supply List button present and clickable in TOOLS section

lesson_cross_references.notes: Cross References section displays with Matthew 22:37-39, James 2:14-17, 1 John 3:18, Galatians 6:2, Proverbs 3:27

lesson_memory_verse.notes: Memory Verse displays 'Love your neighbor as yourself' - Mark 12:31 (NIV)
